alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Leon County through 600 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Moccasin Gap, Ralford Greenway, Killearn Estates, Macon Community Park, Fallschase, Baum, Bradfordville, Maclay State Gardens, Tom Brown Park, Miccosukee and Pisgah Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
